projects.title: QuackCash
projects.description: An interactive financial literacy web game for kids built during NTU Hack-a-Duck Hackathon within 24 hours. Collaborated in a cross-disciplinary team to develop engaging gameplay that teaches financial concepts to young generation. Designed and implemented responsive UI and event-driven gameplay logic for cross-device experience. Awards: Employer Challenge Prize (Capital One), Special Prize (Department of Computer Science).

projects.title: About Me Website
projects.description: A personal website showcasing my hobbies, music tastes, anime interests, and life experiences. Built with Gatsby and React, have a look if interested in my music tastes or random fun facts about me.

projects.title: FocusFlow
projects.description: A productivity app designed for ADHD and neurodivergent individuals. Features habit tracking, skill development, and visual progress indicators. Perfect for half-way quitters :D

projects.title: FridgeMind
projects.description: An intelligent food management app that helps users track ingredients, suggest recipes, and reduce food waste through smart recommendations. "Save money, reduce waste."

projects.title: Kanso
projects.description: A minimalist decluttering app inspired by Japanese Zen rock gardens (Karesansui). Built with Flutter for iOS and Android. *Still developing...feel free to explore this demo

projects.title: UK Train Timetable: !=DE/AYED
projects.description: A console application for live UK train departures using the National Rail Darwin API. Features AI-powered natural language queries (Groq or OpenRouter) allowing users to search trains using conversational queries like "Trains from Paddington to Bristol around 3pm". Also supports traditional step-by-step mode for precise searches. Built with C# and .NET 9.0.
projects.videoAlt: UK Train Timetable Console App Demo

projects.title: Fisho vs Whiskers
projects.description: A lighthearted 1v1 card battle game where strategy meets cuteness! Face off against an AI opponent in this fast-paced card game. Be the first to empty your hand by playing valid combinations like pairs, triples, sequences, and bombs. Features intuitive gameplay mechanics inspired by classic card games with a modern web-based interface. Built with Node.js backend and vanilla JavaScript frontend.
projects.imageAlt: Fisho vs Whiskers Card Game Screenshot

projects.title: AI & Robotics Society Website
projects.description: Official website for Nottingham Trent University's AI & Robotics Society. Collaborated as a contributor to build a modern, interactive platform showcasing society projects, events, committee members, and gallery. Features project showcases, event calendar, interactive gallery, and an AI chatbot assistant. Built with Next.js and TypeScript.
